commands.notes: It's just a hyperlink, no biggie.

commands.description: Check how many MarnieBot points you have.
commands.notes: You earn MarnieBot points by watching the stream. 1 point a minute! Points can currently be used to win tokens (see !play) or can be given to other chatters (see !give). I will try to add more functionalitly so feel free to leave your ideas in chat!

commands.description: Spend 60 MarnieBot points to try and win a token!
Check how many MarnieBot tokens you have.
Give another viewer your marnie points!
commands.notes: Just type '!give {points(must be a number)} {username}' to send your points. You must have enough points yourself to send some. Check your points with !points

commands.description: Check how many pokemon TCGO codes there are left in the database.
Check how many MarnieBot tokens you have.
commands.notes: You will need to whisper your email to MarnieBot to recieve your code.
